name: Police Story 3D
description:
In a world full of choices, which will you make?

Police Story 3D is an action pack adventure-filled simulator. Speed your way to the nearest incident in this fast-paced game. Arrived at your destination? Then it’s time to make a decision. Will you play things by the book, or is Bad Cop the route you want to take? Actions have consequences though, and in this unpredictable world, not all is at it seems.

When duty calls, will you answer?

-Be a cop!
-Choose your own path
-Drive a cop car
-Stop criminals
-Unlock upgrades
